verses.verse: And I, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> not <S%G2980>speak<s%> to you as to <S%G4152>spiritual,<s%> but as to <S%G4559>carnal,<s%> even as to <S%G3516>babes<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4222>fed<s%> you with <S%G1051>milk,<s%> and not with <S%G1033>meat:<s%> for till <S%G3768>now<s%> you were not <S%G1410>able<s%> to bear it, <S%G235>neither<s%> <S%G3777><s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> are you <S%G1410>able.<s%>

For you are <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G4559>carnal:<s%> for <S%G3699>whereas<s%> there is <S%G1722>among<s%> you <S%G2205>envying,<s%> and <S%G2054>strife,<s%> and <S%G1370>divisions,<s%> are you not <S%G4559>carnal,<s%> and <S%G4043>walk<s%> as <S%G444>men?<s%>
For <S%G3752>while<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> of Paul; and <S%G2087>another,<s%> I am of <S%G625>Apollos;<s%> are you not <S%G4559>carnal?<s%>

<S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> is Paul, and <S%G5101>who<s%> is <S%G625>Apollos,<s%> but <S%G1249>ministers<s%> by <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G4100>believed,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> to <S%G1538>every<s%> man?
I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5452>planted,<s%> <S%G625>Apollos<s%> <S%G4222>watered;<s%> but <S%G2316>God<s%> gave the <S%G837>increase.<s%>

<S%G5620>So<s%> then <S%G3777>neither<s%> is he that <S%G5452>plants<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> thing, <S%G3777>neither<s%> he that <S%G4222>waters;<s%> but <S%G2316>God<s%> that gives the <S%G837>increase.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> he that <S%G5452>plants<s%> and he that <S%G4222>waters<s%> are <S%G1520>one:<s%> and <S%G1538>every<s%> man shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3408>reward<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2873>labor.<s%>
For we are <S%G4904>laborers<s%> <S%G4904>together<s%> with <S%G2316>God:<s%> you are <S%G2316>God's<s%> <S%G1091>husbandry,<s%> you are <S%G2316>God's<s%> <S%G3619>building.<s%>

<S%G2596>According<s%> to the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> to me, as a <S%G4680>wise<s%> master <S%G753>builder,<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5087>laid<s%> the <S%G2310>foundation,<s%> and <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G2026>builds<s%> <S%G2026>thereon.<s%> But let <S%G1538>every<s%> man take <S%G991>heed<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he <S%G2026>builds<s%> <S%G2026>thereupon.<s%>

For <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G2310>foundation<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G5087>lay<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> that is <S%G5087>laid,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G2026>build<s%> on <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G2310>foundation<s%> <S%G5557>gold,<s%> <S%G696>silver,<s%> <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G3037>stones,<s%> <S%G3586>wood,<s%> <S%G5528>hay,<s%> <S%G2562>stubble;<s%>

<S%G1538>Every<s%> man's <S%G2041>work<s%> shall be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5318>manifest:<s%> for the <S%G2250>day<s%> shall <S%G1213>declare<s%> it, <S%G3754>because<s%> it shall be <S%G601>revealed<s%> by <S%G4442>fire;<s%> and the <S%G4442>fire<s%> shall <S%G1381>try<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> man's <S%G2041>work<s%> of <S%G3697>what<s%> <S%G3697>sort<s%> it is.
<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> man's <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he has <S%G2026>built<s%> <S%G2026>thereupon,<s%> he shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> a <S%G3408>reward.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> man's <S%G2041>work<s%> shall be <S%G2618>burned,<s%> he shall <S%G2210>suffer<s%> <S%G2210>loss:<s%> but he <S%G846>himself<s%> shall be <S%G4982>saved;<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> as by <S%G4442>fire.<s%>
<S%G1492>Know<s%> you not that you are the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and that the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3611>dwells<s%> in you?

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> man <S%G5351>defile<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> him shall <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5351>destroy;<s%> for the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G40>holy,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> temple you are.

Let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G1818>deceive<s%> <S%G1438>himself.<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> man <S%G1722>among<s%> you <S%G1380>seems<s%> to be <S%G4680>wise<s%> in <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> let him <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G3474>fool,<s%> that he may be <S%G4680>wise.<s%>

For the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> is <S%G3472>foolishness<s%> with <S%G2316>God.<s%> For it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> He <S%G1405>takes<s%> the <S%G4680>wise<s%> in their own <S%G3834>craftiness.<s%>
And <S%G3825>again,<s%> The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1097>knows<s%> the <S%G1261>thoughts<s%> of the <S%G4680>wise,<s%> that they are <S%G3152>vain.<s%>
<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G2744>glory<s%> in <S%G444>men.<s%> For <S%G3956>all<s%> things are <S%G5216>your's;<s%>

<S%G1535>Whether<s%> Paul, <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G625>Apollos,<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2786>Cephas,<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> things <S%G1764>present,<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> things to <S%G3195>come;<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> are <S%G5216>your's;<s%>
And you are <S%G5547>Christ's;<s%> and <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G2316>God's.<s%>
